comment: Yeah, starving. No doubt she hit hard times in Honduras. From being able to afford donuts a day to just . Poor dear. Now in the USA, with taxpayer funded welfare, she is actually up to donuts a day.

            :ARG1 (s2 / she)
            :mod (y / yeah))
      :snt2 (d / doubt-01

            :ARG1 (h / hit-01

                              :op1 "Honduras"))))

                        :ARG1 (d2 / donut)

            :ARG3 (j / just))
      :snt4 (d4 / dear
            :mod (p2 / poor))

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
